Body:
if os.path.exists('/tmp/query_ogle.txt'):
    os.remove('/tmp/query_ogle.txt')
cmd = (
    'lcc prepare_query -o query_ogle.txt  -p starid -r 1:100 -p field_num -r 1:10 -p target -r lmc -f q'
    )
sys.argv = cmd.split()
config = mock.Mock()
config.TUN_PARAMS = '/tmp'
config.QUERIES = '/tmp'
prepare_query(config)
assert os.path.exists('/tmp/query_ogle.txt')
